name: Trident
description:
Is this a bird...? Is this an airplane..? No, this is Ukrainian Trident! 

I look up into the sky and see grey lines. Birds are coming back from South. Spring is Coming. Rockets are flying over our heads. We need to stop the war and start preparing our agriculture to the summer! 

Help us stop the war by purchasing this token made by Marina Samokhina, Ukrainian-based artist. We are community of artists from Ukraine trying to raise money and dress Ukrainian soldiers in armour, so that they can throw away russian troops and get back to restoration of our beautiful land.
